questions.title: General
questions.info: Here we add content from the IMS system or mandatory legislation or best practise info

questions.question: Inspector to be in possession of current PVM Design drawing
Has the Morning Inspection been carried out before 1030
Has the Afternoon Inspection been carried out after 1500

questions.title: Signs
questions.info: Here we add content from the IMS system or mandatory legislation or best practise info

questions.question: Are all the signs in the positions indicated on the Design Drawing?
Can all the signs be read by motorists/pedestrians.  (Check Cleanliness, Obstructions, Orientation)?
Are any signs damaged?
Are all signs weighted down and secured?
Is the information board displayed?

questions.title: Traffic Cones
questions.info: Here we add content from the IMS system or mandatory legislation or best practise info

questions.question: Are all the traffic cones in correct positions?
Are all traffic cones clean and visible?
Do all traffic cones have a reflective sleeve?
Are any cones damaged?

questions.title: Road Safety Lamps
questions.info: Here we add content from the IMS system or mandatory legislation or best practise info

questions.question: Are there road safety lamps present within the PVM?
Are any lamps not working?
Are all lamps clean and visible?

questions.title: Traffic Lights
questions.info: Here we add content from the IMS system or mandatory legislation or best practise info

questions.question: Are all traffic lights operating? (observe 2 full cycles of lights changing)?
Are pedestrian routes clearly indicated?

questions.title: Pedestrian Routes
questions.info: Here we add content from the IMS system or mandatory legislation or best practise info

questions.question: Are pedestrian routes clearly indicated?
Are pedestrian routes unobstructed and a minimum of 1m wide?
Do temporary footwayâ€™s in carriageway have barriers and ramps for access?
